completedItems.title: feat: add id to metadata source
fix: Failed to create Twitter client
completedItems.body:
related: https://github.com/elizaOS/eliza/issues/4146

The issue occurs because the service starts before the agent is created. I think the service should be started after the runtime is set up.

completedItems.title: fix: twitter interaction
completedItems.body: I don't think we need to call shouldRespond here. bootstrap already handles that for us.

completedItems.title: docs: removed an extra `~`
completedItems.body:
## What does this PR do?

Noticed an unnecessary `~` in the code, which could potentially cause issues.
Removed it to keep things clean.

completedItems.title: chore(deps): bump the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory with 2 updates
completedItems.body:
Bumps the npm_and_yarn group with 2 updates in the / directory: [dompurify](https://github.com/cure53/DOMPurify) and [katex](https://github.com/KaTeX/KaTeX).

Updates `dompurify` from 3.2.3 to 3.2.4
